title: Chefaa - Pharmacy Delivery App
description:
Chefaa App makes it easy for you to get all your needs from the pharmacy, You can order your medications and non-pharmaceuticals online and get your order delivered to your doorstep. Chefaa app uses GPS to connect patients and pharmacies to help patients get all their pharmacy needs to their homes.

With Chefaa App you can:

1. order medicine online

After visiting the doctor and paying your Vezeeta, you usually go to the pharmacy to get your medication, but instead of searching for your medicine in pharmacies, and waiting for a long time to get your medicine, you can order it via Chefaa online pharmacy app. Chefaa medicine ordering app provides two ways to order medicine: 🔸Scan /upload your prescription or medicine bottle/box picture, then upload it and request the medicine (altibbi). 🔸You can search for your medicine ( dawaya ) databases in Shifa store, then add it to the shopping cart and confirm the order.

2. Order care products and medical supplies online

You can order non-medicinal products e.g: skin care products, baby products, hair and nail care products online through Chefaa Egypt app, in two ways: 🔸Upload the picture of the product you want to shefaa application, then confirm the order. 🔸Choose the product you want from chefaa store, then add it to the shopping cart and confirm the order.

Chefaa services :

1. Chefaa now

It is a service through which you can order medication online and it will be delivered to your address within 1-2 hours from the nearest pharmacy to you.

2. Chefaa Waffar

It is a service through which you can buy skin, hair and body care products from the best brands with special offers and discounts.

3. Chefaa Plus

It is a service with an annual subscription that allows you to get more benefits like discounts and fast delivery Through Chefaa dawaey app, your order will be safely fulfilled and delivered by a pharmacy, in Egypt.

4. Ask a pharmacist

This service helps you to communicate with a specialized pharmacist at any time of the day, seven days a week, to answer your inquiries or help you order a medicine online.

5. Medication reminder

It is a good way to help you stick to medication (dawaa yodawy almrd) appointments and avoid many risks resulting from not adhering to medication appointments. In this reminder, you can add: - Medication name. - Many notes regarding taking the medication. - Medication (dawaya) appointment. - Dose. - Duration of treatment

6. Chefaa blog

It contains many articles that provide a lot of information about diseases and medicines, and tips about nutrition, pregnancy, motherhood, and skin and hair care.

with chefaa you can safely :

✅ Order medicine online by uploading/scanning your prescription (el roshetta) ✅ Get medicine from the nearest pharmacy to be delivered to your doorstep using the least number of clicks. ✅ Search medicine ( dawa misr ) online & locate any medicine you couldn’t find elsewhere. ✅ Use the most convenient payment method for you; online or cash on delivery. ✅ Order medicine with 24/7 medicine delivery, even on the holidays with Chefaa app. ✅ Communicate with a pharmacist directly if needed. ✅ Your pharmacy order( dawaey or cosmetics ) can be delivered now or scheduled to deliver later. ✅ you can follow your order status till delivered to your doorstep. Order your medicine using the easiest to use online pharmacy delivery app in Egypt connecting pharmacies & patients. Do you want to know more? Visit our website:www.chefaa.com

Chefaa app uses GPS to connect patients and pharmacies to help patients get all their pharmacy needs to their homes.

1. order medicine online


After visiting the doctor and paying your Vezeeta, you usually go to the pharmacy to get your medication, but instead of searching for your medicine in pharmacies, and waiting for a long time to get your medicine, you can order it via Chefaa online pharmacy app.

Chefaa medicine ordering app provides two ways to order medicine:
🔸Scan /upload your prescription or medicine bottle/box picture, then upload it and request the medicine (altibbi).
🔸You can search for your medicine ( dawaya ) databases in Shifa store, then add it to the shopping cart and confirm the order.

2. Order care products and medical supplies online


You can order non-medicinal products e.g: skin care products, baby products, hair and nail care products online through Chefaa Egypt app, in two ways:

🔸Upload the picture of the product you want to shefaa application, then confirm the order.
🔸Choose the product you want from chefaa store, then add it to the shopping cart and confirm the order.

Chefaa services :


1. Chefaa now


It is a service through which you can order medication online and it will be delivered to your address within 1-2 hours from the nearest pharmacy to you.

2. Chefaa Waffar


It is a service through which you can buy skin, hair and body care products from the best brands with special offers and discounts.

It is a service with an annual subscription that allows you to get more benefits like discounts and fast delivery
Through Chefaa dawaey app, your order will be safely fulfilled and delivered by a pharmacy, in Egypt.

4. Ask a pharmacist


This service helps you to communicate with a specialized pharmacist at any time of the day, seven days a week, to answer your inquiries or help you order a medicine online.

- Medication name.
- Many notes regarding taking the medication.
- Medication (dawaya) appointment.
- Dose.
- Duration of treatment

6. Chefaa blog


It contains many articles that provide a lot of information about diseases and medicines, and tips about nutrition, pregnancy, motherhood, and skin and hair care.

with chefaa you can safely :


✅ Order medicine online by uploading/scanning your prescription (el roshetta)
✅ Get medicine from the nearest pharmacy to be delivered to your doorstep using the least number of clicks.
✅ Search medicine ( dawa misr ) online & locate any medicine you couldn’t find elsewhere.
✅ Use the most convenient payment method for you; online or cash on delivery.
✅ Order medicine with 24/7 medicine delivery, even on the holidays with Chefaa app.
✅ Communicate with a pharmacist directly if needed.
✅ Your pharmacy order( dawaey or cosmetics ) can be delivered now or scheduled to deliver later.
✅ you can follow your order status till delivered to your doorstep.

Order your medicine using the easiest to use online pharmacy delivery app in Egypt connecting pharmacies & patients.

Do you want to know more?
Visit our website:www.chefaa.com
summary: App for ordering & delivery medicine and cosmetics in Egypt and KSA.
